summary:
### **ASX Buy-Back Notification Summary (CXZ - Connexion Mobility Ltd)**  

- **Type of Buy-Back**: On-market  
- **Total Shares Bought Back to Date**: 47,038,847  
- **Shares Bought Back on Previous Day (1/7/2025)**: 150,000  
- **Buy-Back Period**: 24/10/2024 to 16/10/2025 (may end early if max shares reached)  
- **Approved Buy-Back Limit**: Up to 170,628,991 shares (approved at AGM on 17/10/2024)  
- **Previous Day Pricing**:  
  - **Price Paid**: AUD 0.025 (flat)  
  - **Total Consideration (Previous Day)**: AUD 3,750  
  - **Highest Price Allowed**: AUD 0.0263 (per ASX Rule 7.33)  

**No other material trading or capital impact noted.**
